alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 9:29AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 AM EDT... At 929 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers capable of producing a landspout near Salt Springs, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Fruitland, Lake Como, and Georgetown. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.
